articles.description: Jeep has officially revealed its most powerful Wrangler ever, the Rubicon 392, for the US market. Getting the bad news out of the way first, this 350kW/637Nm monster is being produced in left-hand ...
articles.content:
And it's still no closer to Australia, with only left-hand drive going into production.

articles.title: ALDI supermarket announces huge Black Friday tech sale, including Philips and De’Longhi products - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: The supermarket has announced it's new sale event for tech fans, including a $149 gaming chair and a 65" UHD Smart TV for $599.
articles.content:
ALDI has announced a major sales event to kick-start Black Friday celebrations.
